good.progress: WOW, the progress is truly impressive! I can't wait to see further advancements.
good.bug_issues: This looks really great! Although I noticed a few bugs in the backlog. I hope it won't disrupt anything.
good.presentation: It looks great, although I noticed a few shortcomings. I'm sure you'll fix it.
good.both: It's great that we're moving forward, but shouldn't we focus on refining code?

mixed.progress: Things are going well, everything is working correctly. We're sticking to the plan. Let's see each other next time.
mixed.bug_issues: It's good that we're sticking to the plan, but are the bugs in the backlog really harmless?
mixed.presentation: It looks nice, but why isn't that button working? Can you do something with it?
mixed.both: Hmm, it's good that we're moving forward, but please fix that.

bad.progress: You can't keep postponing the work all the time. Is there any way to speed it up?
bad.bug_issues: Do you even look at the backlog? Where are all these bugs coming from?
bad.presentation: I understand that you want to add some features, but could they at least work?
bad.both: Why are you showing me something like this? Fix those bugs first.
